MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in   CH5 postcode area of Deeside, affecting properties in St. Ethelwolds Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:29PM. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we expect the power to be restored by 8:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:57PM on 8th March 2021
